plot: Contestants can win $1 million by completing ten tasks involving common household objects, with a one-minute time limit for each task.
plot_en: Contestants can win $1 million by completing ten tasks involving common household objects, with a one-minute time limit for each task.
plot_es: Contestants can win $1 million by completing ten tasks involving common household objects, with a one-minute time limit for each task.
title: Minute to Win It
